thread.title: BRIEF-Tianjin Tianhai Investment's Shareholder Guohua Life Plans To Unload Stake

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tianjin Tianhai Investment's Shareholder Guohua Life Plans To Unload Stake

organizations.name: reuters) - tianjin tianhai investment co ltd
brief-tianjin tianhai investment's shareholder guohua life plans to unload stake feb

text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Tianjin Tianhai Investment Co Ltd :
* SAYS SHAREHOLDER GUOHUA LIFE PLANS TO UNLOAD UP TO 419.0 MILLION SHARES, REPRESENTING 14.45 PERCENT STAKE, IN THE COMPANY WITHIN 24 MTHS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2nooaHa Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
